meta.videoTitle: How to Improve Oral Health & Its Critical Role in Brain & Body Health

paragraphList.text_en: Brushing your tongue is an essential part of maintaining good oral health, as discussed in the text. The tongue plays a crucial role in the mouth's microbiome, as different bacteria, both beneficial and harmful, can accumulate on its surface throughout the day and night. Dental health care professionals recommend tongue scraping or brushing to remove this build-up of bacteria. While scraping the tongue is common, some experts argue that lightly brushing the tongue may be more effective as it minimizes the risk of damaging the delicate tongue tissue.
paragraphList.text_zh: 如文中所述，刷牙是保持口腔健康的重要组成部分。舌头在口腔的微生物组中起着至关重要的作用，因为不同的细菌，无论是有益的还是有害的，都会在其表面日夜积聚。牙科保健专业人士建议刮舌头或刷牙来清除这种细菌。虽然刮舌头很常见，但一些专家认为，轻轻刷舌头可能更有效，因为它可以最大限度地降低损坏脆弱舌头组织的风险。

paragraphList.text_en: It is important to note that using a separate toothbrush specifically for brushing the tongue is advised by professionals. The rationale behind this recommendation is to avoid cross-contamination between the teeth and tongue, especially if the tongue is brushed too vigorously. By using a separate toothbrush, the risk of transferring bacteria from one area to another is minimized. Additionally, it is suggested to rinse and dry off the toothbrush head after each use to prevent the proliferation of bacteria.
paragraphList.text_zh: 需要注意的是，专业人士建议使用专门用于刷舌头的单独牙刷。这一建议背后的理由是避免牙齿和舌头之间的交叉污染，尤其是当舌头刷得太用力时。通过使用单独的牙刷，将细菌从一个区域转移到另一个区域的风险降至最低。此外，建议每次使用后冲洗并擦干牙刷头，以防止细菌繁殖。

paragraphList.text_en: Furthermore, the discussion on toothbrush care emphasizes the importance of maintaining the cleanliness of the toothbrush. After brushing the teeth or tongue, bacteria can accumulate on the toothbrush, especially when it becomes moist. This raises questions about whether to cover the toothbrush or let it air dry, as well as considerations about utilizing UV irradiation for sterilization. While there is no specific recommendation on how often to replace a toothbrush, it is crucial to be mindful of the bacteria growth on the toothbrush head and take measures to keep it clean between uses.
paragraphList.text_zh: 此外，关于牙刷护理的讨论强调了保持牙刷清洁的重要性。刷完牙齿或舌头后，细菌会积聚在牙刷上，尤其是当牙刷变得潮湿时。这引发了关于是盖上牙刷还是让它风干的问题，以及关于利用紫外线照射进行消毒的考虑。虽然没有关于多久更换一次牙刷的具体建议，但至关重要的是要注意牙刷头上的细菌生长，并在使用之间采取措施保持清洁。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, proper tongue brushing and toothbrush care are vital components of supporting oral health and maintaining a healthy oral microbiome. By incorporating the advice of dental health care professionals, such as using a separate toothbrush for the tongue and following good hygiene practices for toothbrush care, individuals can promote optimal oral hygiene and reduce the risk of bacterial contamination.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总之，正确的刷牙和牙刷护理是支持口腔健康和维持健康口腔微生物组的重要组成部分。通过采纳牙科保健专业人员的建议，例如使用单独的牙刷清洁舌头，并遵循良好的牙刷护理卫生习惯，个人可以促进最佳的口腔卫生，降低细菌污染的风险。
